text: My skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam." Vony upaly prostrate, krim Satan. Vin stav jinn, dlya vin ne pidkoryavsya zamovi Yoho Lorda. Vy budete vybyraty yoho ta yoho nashchadkiv tomu shcho lordy zamistʹ Meni, nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vony budutʹ ye vashi vorohy? Shcho neshchasna zamina
